text:
“Cinq sous, cinq sous!” Katerina Ivanovna shouted. 

“Make haste, Kolya!” 

A policeman approached. 

“What do you want?” she snapped. 

A gentleman in an overcoat stepped forward. 

He handed her a green three-rouble note. 

“Thank you, honoured sir,” she said, bowing. 

“Take the money, Polenka. Generous people help orphans.” 

She continued, “These children are of good family. 

That wretch of a general ate grouse while I begged.” 

“Protect me!” she cried. 

“Why is that policeman edging up to me?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna pleads for help and sympathy from a gentleman while facing trouble with a policeman during a public performance.
